item.description:
Monday night climbing is back!!! Let's do this - hit MetroRock and climb! You'll start the week off right. So good in fact that you'll feel absolutely giddy by mid-week - guaranteed.

I'll be at the picnic table until 7:30; after that, you'll find me climbing.

Newbies are always welcome but you will need to pass a belay test. MetroRock charges $16 for a daypass if you are not already a member or a punch card holder. There's a shuttle from the Orange Line Wellington station if you're coming straight from work. For more information see:

http://www.metrorock....
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the best looking guy in the place. And ask him if he's seen me.
item.name: Monday Night Climbs at Metro are BACK!!!
